comments: According to Bull Soc. Bot. France list of members he was Inspecteur des Eaux et Forets de la France d'Outre Mer, a Libreville, Gabon and later (1965) a Bourecq par Lilliers (Pas de Calais).
examples: Monopetalanthus coriaceus J. Morel ex Aubrev. in Fl. Gabon, 15: 318 (1968).  Morelodendron Cavaco & Normand (1951) is dedicated to this author.
source: IK db. Jan Wieringa.  Bull. Soc. Bot. France, 99: xxvii (1952).
